item.title: scikit-learn: Building a multi class classification ensemble
item.description: For the Kaggle Spooky Author Identification I wanted to combine multiple classifiers together into an ensemble and found the VotingClassifier that does exactly that. We need to predict the probability that a sentence is written by one of three authors so the VotingClassifier needs to make a 'soft' prediction. If we only needed to know the most likely author we could have it make a 'hard' prediction instead. We start with three classifiers which generate different n-gram based features.
